abstract: Organizers of trade show Outdoor Retailer renew contract to hold twice-yearly show in Salt Lake City through 2018.
lead_paragraph: Organizers of one of the world’s largest outdoor-retail shows will keep the event in Salt Lake City despite a shortage of lodging and meeting space.

headline.main: Large Retail Expo Decides to Stay in Salt Lake City
headline.print_headline: Large Retail Expo Decides to Stay in Salt Lake City

snippet: Organizers of one of the world’s largest outdoor-retail shows will keep the event in Salt Lake City despite a shortage of lodging and meeting space.
